its a fun game and poses a challenge to anyone who doesnt play for hours on end. muscle memory is definatly needed. one of the biggest things that irratates me the most, is the fact that imediatly after reloading you cant shoot for about 2 seconds. its  lost me plenty of rounds because i move faster then it will let me. if this could get fixed that would be awesome. however i will say that coming out with a all around new counter strike game would be welcome also.
